hero.title: We steer renovations with precision and care
hero.description: From the first sketch to the final walkthrough, we orchestrate architecture, engineering and craft so the result feels effortless.

essence.title: Full-spectrum coordination
essence.text: Every phase has a dedicated lead and clear milestones, so clients always know what comes next.

essence.title: Transparent process
essence.text: Weekly reports, detailed budgets and on-site supervision keep every project grounded.

essence.title: Crafted execution
essence.text: Our in-house joinery and trusted partners let us realize bespoke details with confidence.

teamDescription: These specialists bring design, technical direction and client care so you feel supported behind the scenes.

team.subtitle: With fifteen years of hands-on experience, Robert guides every project with a steady balance of architecture, engineering and craft.

teamMembers.name: Marta Vávrová
teamMembers.bio: Marta sets material palettes, curates styling and develops detailed visualizations for every phase.

teamMembers.name: Ondřej Dvořák
teamMembers.bio: He oversees engineering, structural reviews and budgets to make sure the concept is buildable.

teamMembers.name: Elena Křížová
teamMembers.bio: Elena manages client communication, schedules walkthroughs and keeps the process calm and transparent.

historyIntro: Every milestone has shaped the studio into an unwavering partner for complex renovations.

history.title: Studio founded
history.description: Robert Šiška launched the practice, weaving architectural intent with craftsmanship.

history.title: In-house workshop
history.description: Adding a joinery workshop gave control over bespoke furniture, millwork and finishes.

history.title: Prague milestone projects
history.description: Over twenty luxury apartment renovations were delivered with dedicated artistic oversight.

history.title: Chicago collaboration
history.description: European expertise joined forces with modern American craftsmanship, expanding our lens internationally.
